params._blockNumber: Number of the block to get the hash for

returns._0: Block hash for the given block

params._blockHash: Block hash of the block to get the witness root for

returns._0: Witness root for the given block

params._blockNumber: Block number of the block to get the witness root for

returns._0: Merkle root for the given block

params._blockNumber: L1 block number that is associated with the genesis block of Citrea

setBlockInfo(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Block number is incremented by the contract as no block info should be overwritten or skipped

params._blockHash: Hash of the current L1 block
params._witnessRoot: Witness root of the current L1 block, must be in little endian

verifyInclusion(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,ui.details: Witness transaction ID and proof elements must be in little endian

returns._0: If the witness transaction ID is included in the witness root hash of the block

verifyInclusion(uint256,bytes32,bytes,ui.details: Witness transaction ID and proof elements must be in little endian

returns._0: If the witness transaction ID is included in the witness root hash of the block

verifyInclusionByTxId(uint256,bytes32,by.details: Transaction ID and proof elements must be in little endian

params._blockHeader: Block header of the associated Bitcoin block

returns._0: If the transaction ID is included in the merkle root hash of the block

initializeBlockNumber(uint256).notice: Sets the initial value for the block number, can only be called once

setBlockInfo(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).notice: Sets the block hash and witness root for a given blockCan only be called after the initial block number is set

verifyInclusion(bytes32,bytes32,bytes,ui.notice: Verifies the inclusion of a witness transaction ID in the witness root hash of a block

verifyInclusion(uint256,bytes32,bytes,ui.notice: Verifies the inclusion of a witness transaction ID in the witness root hash of a block
